verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> ye Jehovah<WH3050>. Praise<WH1984> Jehovah<WH3050>, O my soul<WH5315>.
While I live<WH2416> will I praise<WH1984> Jehovah<WH3068>: I will sing praises<WH2167> unto my God while I have any being<WH430>.
Put not your trust<WH982> in princes<WH5081>, Nor in the son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, in whom there is no help<WH8668>.
His breath<WH7307> goeth forth<WH3318>, he returneth<WH7725> to his earth<WH127>; In that very day<WH3117> his thoughts<WH6250> perish<WH6>.
Happy <WH835> is he that hath the God<WH410> of Jacob<WH3290> for his help<WH5828>, Whose hope<WH7664> is in Jehovah<WH3068> his God<WH430>:
Who made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>, The sea<WH3220>, and all that in them is<WH8104>; Who keepeth truth<WH571> for ever<WH5769>;
Who executeth<WH6213> justice<WH4941> for the oppressed<WH6231>; Who giveth<WH5414> food<WH3899> to the hungry<WH7457>. Jehovah<WH3068> looseth<WH5425> the prisoners<WH631>;
Jehovah <WH3068> openeth<WH6491> the eyes of the blind<WH5787>; Jehovah<WH3068> raiseth<WH2210> up them that are bowed down<WH3721>; Jehovah<WH3068> loveth<WH157> the righteous<WH6662>;
Jehovah <WH3068> preserveth<WH8104> the sojourners<WH1616>; He upholdeth<WH5749> the fatherless<WH3490> and widow<WH490>; But the way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> he turneth upside down<WH5791>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will reign<WH4427> for ever<WH5769>, Thy God<WH430>, O Zion<WH6726>, unto all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>. Praise<WH1984> ye Jehovah<WH3050>.
